titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Records of the Office of the Treasurer
1830-1982
(Bulk 1900-1960)
RG 10.2
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Partially processed

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-09-28T14:05-0400

did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the Treasurer
did.abstract: This collection contains annual reports and financial reports created by the Office of the Treasurer.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: New York University. Office of the Treasurer

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: The collection was transferred to the University Archives from the Office of the Treasurer in multiple accessions.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Institutional records of New York University are closed for a period of 20 years from the date of their creation (the date on which each document was written). Board of Trustees records are similarly closed for 35 years from the date of creation. The opening date for files spanning several years will be 20 years from the most recent date. Access will be given to material already 20 years old contained within a collection that is not yet open when such material can be isolated from the rest of the collection. Materials related to personnel, faculty grievances, job searches and all files with information that falls under the University's Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) policy are permanently restricted. Please contact the University Archivists with specific questions regarding restrictions.

This collection is in
off-site storage .

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Some materials may be restricted. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2641
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: university-archives@nyu.edu

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Office of the Treasurer, now called the Office of Finance, is responsible for financing transactions, the University's relation with banks, management of short-term cash, overseeing the Bursar's Ofice and Insurance Department, and processing gifts to the University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains annual reports and financial reports created by the Office of the Treasurer.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The files are grouped into 1 series:

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: There is no information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials that have been physically separated or removed.
